text: Ezɨ dughiar mam Jonɨn suren gumaziba ko Farisin suren gumaziba, me God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ataghɨrasi. Ezɨ Iesusɨn suren gumaziba dughiar kamɨn apima gumazir maba Iesus bagha izava kamaghɨn an azangsɨsi, “Kar manmaghɨn amizir arazim, Jonɨn suren gumaziba ko Farisibar suren gumaziba, me datɨrɨghɨn God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ataghɨrazima, nɨn suren gumaziba God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ataghɨrazir puvatɨ?”
